{{cpp/coroutine/coroutine_handle/title|operator bool}}
{{cpp/coroutine/coroutine_handle/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++20|
constexpr explicit operator bool() const noexcept;
}}

Checks whether {{c|*this}} is non-null, i.e. the value of {{c|*this}} is obtained from the promise object of some coroutine. Equivalent to {{c|return bool(address());}}.

If {{tt|Promise}} is {{lc|std::noop_coroutine_promise}}, this conversion function always returns {{c|true}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
{{c|bool(address())}}, or {{c|true}} if {{tt|Promise}} is {{lc|std::noop_coroutine_promise}}.
